post.title: The free speech warriors Reee'ing at the Devs are the ones who participate most heavily in downvoting as an attempt to turn Ruqqus into a far right echo chamber. This is some clown shit.

body:
Maybe it's because I'm used to getting downvoted into oblivion on 99.99% of the internet, but I've personally never really been bothered by downvotes or viewed it as a form of censorship. In fact, I personally either scroll all the way down to the most downvoted comments or click the "controversial" tab in order to get to the good stuff. 

And besides, you're flipping reality upside down. It's the leftist cabal on Discord which has been caught advocating for brigading and downvoting right-wing content on Ruqqus [[1]](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord)[[2]](https://files.catbox.moe/69toep.png). Feel free to show me proof of right wingers coordinating to do the same. Our downvotes are simply organic because we comprise a majority of the userbase. And downvoting content that you disagree with is hardly limited to right wingers on Ruqqus. Literally everyone does it on the entire fucking internet.
body_html:
Maybe it's because I'm used to getting downvoted into oblivion on 99.99% of the internet, but I've personally never really been bothered by downvotes or viewed it as a form of censorship. And besides, you're flipping reality upside down. It's the leftist cabal on Discord which has been caught advocating for brigading and downvoting right-wing content on Ruqqus [1][2]. Feel free to show me proof of right wingers coordinating to do the same. Our downvotes are simply organic because we comprise a majority of the userbase. And downvoting content that you disagree with is hardly limited to right wingers on Ruqqus. Literally everyone does it on the entire fucking internet.

post.title: The free speech warriors Reee'ing at the Devs are the ones who participate most heavily in downvoting as an attempt to turn Ruqqus into a far right echo chamber. This is some clown shit.

body:
Honestly, it does 2 things - stop people from downvoting literally everything in all (which I assume to be relatively bipartisan downvoting), and protecting off-topic and bait posts (which are easy and fast enough to realistically trigger the downvote cap).

For the latter reason, I think it deserves criticism, especially criticism that points out the flaws or can suggest alternatives and why they may work better. I'd certainly say providing feedback, even just "I don't like this" is more helpful then trying to further define the divide between the users here.

edit: And you made a new post to complain that people are downvoting comments where you sling insults and vile after calling others the radicals? Its hard to give you the benefit of the doubt when you do this.
body_html:
Honestly, it does 2 things - stop people from downvoting literally everything in all (which I assume to be relatively bipartisan downvoting), and protecting off-topic and bait posts (which are easy and fast enough to realistically trigger the downvote cap).

For the latter reason, I think it deserves criticism, especially criticism that points out the flaws or can suggest alternatives and why they may work better. I'd certainly say providing feedback, even just "I don't like this" is more helpful then trying to further define the divide between the users here.

edit: And you made a new post to complain that people are downvoting comments where you sling insults and vile after calling others the radicals? Its hard to give you the benefit of the doubt when you do this.

body: Literally everything. From the tiniest to the largest things, @no_chill insanely excels. I mean, she is the kind of person who could walk into a room full of people who had done something as a career their entire lives, never having done it before, and blow them away with just a casual attempt. She's creative, ultra intelligent, super brilliant, seems to know almost everything, and is always in the right place at the right time. Just one of those kinds of people. I know a ton of people like that, who are perfect in almost every way, and I've always been really jealous of them because I'm just not like that, try as I might to become that way, it's just not going to happen because I didn't get those genes.
